block.p: DELPHI CORP., Troy, Mich., an auto parts maker, said it had a multiyear contract with General Motors, Detroit, to supply brake systems for minivans. Terms were not disclosed.
FOSTER WHEELER LTD., Clinton, N.J., a builder of refineries, said its unit in Spain had won a $100 million contract with BP, London, to upgrade a Spanish refinery.
